JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description:         Responsibilities :         The key responsibility of this role is to address business needs by building products using a combination of innovative spirit and pragmatism complemented by technical acumen.   You should take ownership of functional correctness, scalability, maintainability and monitoring of the deployed code.   You should possess strong skills in system design and architecture with a keen eye for progressive evolution of software solutions.     Technical requirements     Proficiency in web application development using Java and Spring Boot.   Excellent ability to understand a problem statement and articulate a solution for the same.   Hands-on experience developing REST APIs and understanding of related terminologies.   Good understanding of SQL (Postgres/MySQL).   Knowledge of version control software, preferably Git.     Experience Range:   3 - 6 years     Educational Qualifications:   B.Tech/B.E,orM.Tech      Skills Required :   Java,Spring Boot,Distributed systems, Microservices, MongoDB,
